statement.p: A manufacturer has just announced their new video game. The accounting department has determined that the cost to manufacturer the video game is \displaystyle{c}={21.68}{n}+{48034}, where \displaystyle{n} is the number of units manufactured and \displaystyle{c} is the resulting cost. The revenue equation is \displaystyle{c}={87.48}{n}. What is the break even point?

solution.p: The equations are already written for us, so we just need to solve the system. We can use substitution.
Substitute the expression \displaystyle{21.68}{n}+{48034} from the first equation into the second equation and solve for \displaystyle{n}.
